page.title: 13KEMBLE SHOP
page.content: {Kemble shop}is situated on the west side of{Kemble.}It is in Windmill Road next to the old Police House. It is owned by Mr Godsell who lives next to the aerodrome. The shop is a general store where you can buy sweets, seeds, canned foods and drinks of all kinds. It is also a{Post Office}where you can buy stamps, envelopes, glue and colouring books. The{Post Office}is run by Mrs Saunders. In{Kemble}there used to be a shop called "The Co-op". It is now a house called "The Old Co-op". Most people in Kemble go to{ {Cirencester}to do their shopping. If they want big things, they go to{ {Swindon, Gloucester, Bath, Bristol or {Cheltenham. }
